trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oregon City
There were no other sightings in Oregon City on or around August 24th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThis time I was sitting with my wife in the backyard when we saw the object traveling from the NE toward the SE sky. This time only one was traveling, very fast. As a matter of fact faster than we have ever experience since we first saw them a week ago. I went to get my digital video camera to record it. By the time I got back it had disappeared. My wife says it took off quick and traveled to the same section of the sky as the other ones have done.
